original_text: “When you are helping the Hebrew women during childbirth on the delivery stool, if you see that the baby is a boy, kill him; but if it is a girl, let her live.”
korean_text: 이르되 너희는 히브리 여인을 위하여 해산을 도울 때에 그 자리를 살펴서 아들이거든 그를 죽이고 딸이거든 살려두라

sentences.original_text: When you are helping the Hebrew women
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 히브리 여인들을 돕보고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: during childbirth on the delivery stool
if you see that the baby is a boy
but if it is a girl
